description:
Art=Visual's Practical Photoshop CS5 Level 2 video course picks up where the Level 1 course left off. You have the retouching and basic compositing skills, now it's time to start creating advanced compositions from multiple images using masking, blend modes, and advanced layer techniques. Use filters non-destructively utilizing Smart Objects, Smart Filters, and Smart Text. Create amazing 3D Text and Shapes.  This course is essential for anyone working as a graphic or web designer,  The skills taught in our Level 2 course are used in the creation ALL advertisements, brochures, posters, CD covers, magazines, and other print and web graphics.  Lessons on HDR imaging (High Dynamic Range), Panoramas, Camera RAW, Creative Filters, and Black and White Conversion make this a perfect course for Photographers as well.

The course offers 21.5 hours of education in 15 easy-to-follow lessons.  The actual images used in the course are provided, so you can work along at your own pace.
title: Practical Photoshop CS5 Level 2
